about.title: About
about.subtitle: Passionate student developer & Tech enthusiast
about.description1: I am Satheeskumar Santhosh, a BTS SIO SLAM student based in Argenteuil, France. I am passionate about software development and am currently looking for an internship from December 1st, 2025 to January 25th, 2026.
about.description2: Motivated, rigorous and eager to learn, I like working on concrete projects involving web development, networking and cybersecurity. I strive to continuously improve my technical and creative skills through personal projects and technology watching.
about.dev_desc: Skills in Python, Java, JavaScript and React to create interactive and high-performance web and desktop applications.
about.tech_desc: Experience with networks, virtualization and security tools such as VirtualBox, Nmap and Metasploit.
about.exp_desc: Practical internships in IT support, system and network configuration in companies such as XEFI and Tek Wave.

skills.name: Versatility & Adaptability
skills.description: Ability to quickly adapt to new environments and juggle different technical and organizational tasks.

skills.name: Technical Communication & Documentation
skills.description: Ability to explain complex concepts and produce clear and structured documentation for projects.

skills.name: Customer Service & Listening
skills.description: Commitment to understanding user needs and providing appropriate solutions with empathy and professionalism.

skills.name: Curiosity & Continuous Learning
skills.description: Active technology watch and constant desire to explore new technologies to stay at the leading edge.

skills.name: Intercultural Communication
skills.description: Ability to evolve and collaborate effectively in diverse and multicultural environments.

skills.name: Rigor & Precision
skills.description: Attention to detail and commitment to excellence in code, testing and final project delivery.

93moove.title: 93Moove
93moove.description: A web application dedicated to the management and promotion of sports, manual and cultural activities for the 93Moove association in Saint-Ouen. Includes session management, an admin space and secure authentication.
